name: Historic Tour + Wet Market Visit
description:
With our historic tour, you will learn everything you need to know about the Shanghai colonial history, from 1842 to 1949. Explore the charming Molière and Massenet roads, discover unique colonial houses like the former residence of Chinese leaders Zhou Enlai and Sun Yat Sen, the house of the richest British family, and their link with Shanghai history. 
 
You will also visit one of the best wet markets in Shanghai and learn which kind of meats and vegetables are available as well as how to negotiate in Chinese!
